Description_lang: Hurl bolts of decimating magic at your target, dealing $<damage> Shadow damage and increasing the damage of your next$?s198590[][ $386698u] $?s137046[Incinerates]?a137044&?!s137046[Demonbolts]?!a137044[Shadow Bolts or Drain Souls][] by $386698s1%.$?a196408[ This value is reduced while using Fire and Brimstone.][]Decimating Bolt's damage, and the bonus to $?s137046[Incinerate]?a137044[Demonbolt]?!s137046&!a137044[Shadow Bolt and Drain Soul][] both increase as your target's health decreases.
